page.title: 08St.Andrew's Church,OLD
page.content: The Church in Old is situated in the centre of the village close to the Public House.It has a square tower. There is Holy Communion every Sunday and Evensong once per month. The structure of the church is in poor repair and a major fund raising scheme is underway.About Â£8000 is needed to repair crumbling stonework on the south walls.It is hoped to get a grant from the Department of the Environment for part of this but around Â£5000 must come from fund raising. A{Flower Festival}is held annually in July in the church and the proceeds go to the fund, as do those from the annual{Fete}. The church is important to about 30% of the village,but few attend services regularly.
